mapper.select: select em.employeeid,em.employeename,em.employeecode,em.cellphone,em.eemail,em.sysmanager,em.merchantbaseinfoid merchantid, em.distributioncode, em.isonline,ep.expresscompanyid,ep.companyname,ep.expresscompanycode,ep.companyflag,ep.parentid, ep.billparent, d.distributionname,em.avatar,dt.districtid,dt.districtname from PS_PMS.EMPLOYEE em join ps_pms.expresscompany ep on em.stationid=ep.expresscompanyid join ps_pms.distribution d on d.distributioncode = em.distributioncode join ps_pms.district dt on dt.districtid = ep.districtid where em.employeeid=#{employeeid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
